00276 //------------------------------------------
00277 void BdkPdfOnRes::initParameters(BdkPdfOnRes::Options opt) {
00278   _sigGoodD0NumEvts = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".sigGoodD0NumEvts", 
00279                                     TString(GetTitle())+" sigGoodD0 # events", 
00280                                      _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00281   _sigGoodD0NumEvts->setError(10);
00282 
00283   _sigBadD0Frac = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".sigBadD0Frac", 
00284                                    TString(GetTitle())+" sigBadD0/sigGoodD0", 
00285                                    _maxRange, 0, 100);
00286   _sigBadD0Frac->setError(0.01);
00287 
00288   _DpiGoodD0NumEvts = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".DpiGoodD0NumEvts", 
00289                                     TString(GetTitle())+" DpiGoodD0 # events", 
00290                                     _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00291   _DpiGoodD0NumEvts->setError(10);
00292 
00293   _DpiBadD0Frac = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".DpiBadD0Frac", 
00294                                    TString(GetTitle())+" DpiBadD0/DpiGoodD0", 
00295                                    _maxRange, 0, 100);
00296   _DpiBadD0Frac->setError(0.01);  
00297 
00298 //  _DPiXNumEvts = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".DPiXNumEvts", 
00299 //                              TString(GetTitle())+" DPiX # events", 
00300 //                              _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00301 //  _DPiXNumEvts->setError(10);
00302 
00303 //  _DKXNumEvts = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".DKXNumEvts", 
00304 //                                  TString(GetTitle())+" DKX # events", 
00305 //                                  _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00306 //  _DKXNumEvts->setError(10); 
00307 
00308   _totBBNumEvts = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".totBBNumEvts",
00309                                TString(GetTitle())+" All other BB # events",
00310                                _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00311   _totBBNumEvts->setError(10);
00312 
00313 //  _DPiXFrac = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".DPiXFrac",
00314 //                            TString(GetTitle())+" DKOther/totBBDKPi",
00315 //                            _maxRange, 0, 100);
00316 //  _DPiXFrac->setError(0.01);
00317 
00318   _DKXFrac = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".DKXFrac",
00319                             TString(GetTitle())+" DKOther/numDKP",
00320                             _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00321   _DKXFrac->setError(0.01);
00322 
00323 //  _BBBadD0NumEvts = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".BBBadD0NumEvts", 
00324 //                                 TString(GetTitle())+" BBBadD0 # events", 
00325 //                                 _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00326 //  _BBBadD0NumEvts->setError(10); 
00327 
00328   _DPiXFrac = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".DPiXFrac",
00329                             TString(GetTitle())+" D0 pi Other/totBBDKPi",
00330                             _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00331   _DPiXFrac->setError(0.01);
00332   
00333   _BBGoodD0Frac = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".BBGoodD0Frac", 
00334                                   TString(GetTitle())+" BBGoodD0/BBBadD0", 
00335                                   _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00336   _BBGoodD0Frac->setError(0.01); 
00337 
00338   _qqBadD0NumEvts = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".qqBadD0NumEvts", 
00339                                    TString(GetTitle())+" qqBadD0 # events", 
00340                                    _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00341   _qqBadD0NumEvts->setError(10);
00342 
00343   _qqGoodD0Frac = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".qqGoodD0Frac", 
00344                                   TString(GetTitle())+" qqGoodD0/qqBadD0", 
00345                                   _maxRange, 0, _maxRange);
00346   _qqGoodD0Frac->setError(0.01);
00347 
00348   // Setup the formulas for the #'s of bad D's:
00349     _sigBadD0NumEvts = 
00350     new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName())+".sigBadD0NumEvts",
00351                       TString(GetTitle())+" sigBadD0NumEvts",
00352                       TString(_sigGoodD0NumEvts->GetName()) + "*" 
00353                          + TString(_sigBadD0Frac->GetName()), 
00354                       RooArgList(*_sigGoodD0NumEvts, *_sigBadD0Frac));
00355 
00356   _DpiBadD0NumEvts = 
00357     new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName())+".DpiBadD0NumEvts",
00358                       TString(GetTitle())+" DpiBadD0NumEvts",
00359                       TString(_DpiGoodD0NumEvts->GetName()) + "*" 
00360                          + TString(_DpiBadD0Frac->GetName()), 
00361                       RooArgList(*_DpiGoodD0NumEvts, *_DpiBadD0Frac));
00362 
00363   _BBGoodD0NumEvts = 
00364     new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName())+".BBGoodD0NumEvts",
00365                       TString(GetTitle())+" BBGoodD0NumEvts",
00366                       TString(_totBBNumEvts->GetName()) + "*" 
00367                          + TString(_BBGoodD0Frac->GetName()), 
00368                       RooArgList(*_totBBNumEvts, *_BBGoodD0Frac));
00369 
00370   _qqGoodD0NumEvts = 
00371     new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName())+".qqGoodD0NumEvts",
00372                       TString(GetTitle())+" qqGoodD0NumEvts",
00373                       TString(_qqBadD0NumEvts->GetName()) + "*" 
00374                          + TString(_qqGoodD0Frac->GetName()), 
00375                       RooArgList(*_qqBadD0NumEvts, *_qqGoodD0Frac));
00376 
00377   _DKXNumEvts =
00378     new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName())+".DKXNumEvts",
00379                       TString(GetTitle())+" DKXNumEvts",
00380                       TString(_totBBNumEvts->GetName()) + "*"
00381                          + TString(_DKXFrac->GetName()) + "*" 
00382                          + TString(_DPiXFrac->GetName()),
00383                       RooArgList(*_totBBNumEvts, *_DKXFrac, *_DPiXFrac));  
00384 
00385   _DPiXNumEvts =
00386     new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName())+".DPiXNumEvts",
00387                       TString(GetTitle())+" DPiXNumEvts",
00388                       TString(_totBBNumEvts->GetName())+"*"
00389                         + TString(_DPiXFrac->GetName()),
00390                       RooArgList(*_totBBNumEvts, *_DPiXFrac));
00391 
00392  
00393   _BBBadD0NumEvts =
00394     new RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName())+".BBBadD0NumEvts",
00395                       TString(GetTitle())+" BBBadD0NumEvts",
00396                       TString(_totBBNumEvts->GetName())+"*(1.0 - ("
00397                          + TString(_DKXFrac->GetName()) +" + 1.0 ) *"  
00398                          + TString(_DPiXFrac->GetName()) + " )" ,
00399                       RooArgList(*_totBBNumEvts, *_DKXFrac, *_DPiXFrac));
00400 
00401   //set up connection between _numEvt between all these above numbers
00402   _numEvt[0] = _sigBadD0NumEvts; 
00403   _numEvt[1] = _sigGoodD0NumEvts;
00404   _numEvt[2] = _DpiBadD0NumEvts;
00405   _numEvt[3] = _DpiGoodD0NumEvts;
00406   _numEvt[4] = _DPiXNumEvts;
00407   _numEvt[5] = _DKXNumEvts;
00408   _numEvt[6] = _BBBadD0NumEvts;
00409   _numEvt[7] = _BBGoodD0NumEvts;
00410   _numEvt[8] = _qqBadD0NumEvts;
00411   _numEvt[9] = _qqGoodD0NumEvts; 
00412 
00413   // initialize _globalAsym:
00414   _globalAsym = new 
00415     RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".globalAsym", 
00416                TString(GetTitle()) + " global asymmetry", 
00417                0, -1, 1);
00418 
00419 
00420   // for each evt type
00421   for (int t = 0; t < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++t){
00422     // Initialize the asymmetries:
00423     _typeAsym[t] = new 
00424       RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + TString(".asym") + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00425                  TString(GetTitle()) + TString(" asymmetry of ") 
00426                  + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00427                  0, -1, 1);
00428   }
00429 
00430   // link bad D asym to good D asym if requested (for systematics studies)
00431   if (opt && BdkPdfOnRes::linkGoodBadSigAsym) 
00432     asymLink(BdkEvtTypes::SIG_BAD_D,BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D);
00433 
00434 
00435   for (int t = 0; t < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++t){
00436     // The actual asymmetries are typeAsym + globalAsym:
00437 
00438     _asym[t] = new 
00439       RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName()) + TString(".finalAsym") 
00440                       + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00441                     TString(GetTitle()) + TString(" final asymmetry of ") 
00442                       + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00443                     TString(_typeAsym[t]->GetName()) + "+"
00444                       + TString(_globalAsym->GetName()),
00445                     RooArgList(*_typeAsym[t], *_globalAsym));
00446     // The # of events is N+ = N/2(1-A),  N- = N/2(1+A),  
00447     _numEvtPos[t] = new 
00448       RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName()) + TString(".numEvtPos")
00449                       + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00450                     TString(GetTitle()) + TString(" numEvts positive ")
00451                       + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00452                     TString(_numEvt[t]->GetName())
00453                       + TString("/2*(1-") 
00454                       + TString(_asym[t]->GetName())
00455                       + TString(")"),
00456                     RooArgList(*_numEvt[t], *_asym[t]));
00457 
00458     _numEvtNeg[t] = new 
00459       RooFormulaVar(TString(GetName()) + TString(".numEvtNeg")
00460                       + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00461                     TString(GetTitle()) + TString(" numEvts negative ")
00462                       + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00463                     TString(_numEvt[t]->GetName())
00464                       + TString("/2*(1+") 
00465                       + TString(_asym[t]->GetName())
00466                       + TString(")"),
00467                     RooArgList(*_numEvt[t], *_asym[t]));
00468   }
00469 
00470   // add the components:
00471   removeComponents();
00472   for (int c = 0; c < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++c) {
00473     addComponent(*prodP(c));
00474     addComponent(*prodN(c));
00475   }
00476 
00477   // number of BB events
00478   _nBB = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".nBB",
00479                         TString(GetTitle()) + " nBB",
00480                         0);
00481 
00482   // absolute (cut&count) efficiency
00483   _absoluteEff = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".absoluteEff",
00484                                 TString(GetTitle()) + " absoluteEff",
00485                                 0);
00486 
00487   // B -> DK branching fraction
00488   _brBtoDK = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".brBtoDK",
00489                             TString(GetTitle()) + " brBtoDK",
00490                             0);
00491 
00492   // D -> K pi pi branching fraction
00493   _brDtoK2pi = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".brDtoK2pi",
00494                               TString(GetTitle()) + " brDtoK2pi",
00495                               0);
00496 
00497   // (D -> 3pi) / (D -> K 2pi) branching fraction ratio
00498   _brDto3piOverK2pi = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".brDto3piOverK2pi",
00499                                      TString(GetTitle()) + " brDto3piOverK2pi",
00500                                      0);
00501 
00502   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00503 }
00504 
00505 //------------------------------------------
00506 RooArgSet BdkPdfOnRes::dependents()
00507 {
00508   // make sure PDF is valid (e.g. after changing the components)
00509   if (getIsValid()==kFALSE) getPdf();
00510 
00511   return BdkPdfComposite::dependents();
00512 }
00513 
00514 
00515 //------------------------------------------
00516 void BdkPdfOnRes::createPdf() {  
00517   int t;
00518 
00519   // init extended PDFs:
00520   for (t = 0; t < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++t) {
00521     _extPdfPos[t] = new 
00522       RooExtendPdf(TString(GetName()) 
00523                      + TString(".extPdfPos") 
00524                      + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00525                    TString(GetTitle()) 
00526                      + " Extended Pdf for positive "
00527                      + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00528                    *(prodP(t)->getPdf()), 
00529                    *_numEvtPos[t]); 
00530   
00531     _extPdfNeg[t] = new 
00532       RooExtendPdf(TString(GetName()) 
00533                      + TString(".extPdfNeg") 
00534                      + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00535                    TString(GetTitle()) 
00536                      + " Extended Pdf for negative "
00537                      + BdkEvtTypes::name(t),
00538                    *(prodN(t)->getPdf()), 
00539                    *_numEvtNeg[t]); 
00540   }  
00541 
00542   // Put the # of events variables and extended PDFs into ArgSets:
00543   RooArgList extPdfListPos;
00544   RooArgList evtNumsPos;
00545 
00546   RooArgList extPdfListNeg;
00547   RooArgList evtNumsNeg;
00548 
00549   for (t = 0; t < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++t) {    
00550     evtNumsPos.add(*_numEvtPos[t]);
00551     extPdfListPos.add(*_extPdfPos[t]);
00552 
00553     evtNumsNeg.add(*_numEvtNeg[t]);
00554     extPdfListNeg.add(*_extPdfNeg[t]);
00555   }
00556   
00557   // Make the 2 sum PDFs:
00558   _addPdfPos = 
00559     new RooAddPdf(TString(GetName())+".pdfPos", 
00560                   TString(GetTitle())+" pdf positive", 
00561                   extPdfListPos, evtNumsPos);
00562 
00563   _addPdfNeg = 
00564     new RooAddPdf(TString(GetName())+".pdfNeg", 
00565                   TString(GetTitle())+" pdf negative", 
00566                   extPdfListNeg, evtNumsNeg);
00567 
00568   // Make the simultaneous PDF:
00569   RooArgList simuPdfList(*_addPdfPos, *_addPdfNeg);
00570 
00571   RooSimultaneous * thePdf = new
00572     RooSimultaneous(TString(GetName()) + ".thePdf",
00573                     TString(GetTitle()) + " simultaneous pdf ",
00574                     simuPdfList,
00575                     *_charge);
00576 
00577   setPdf(*thePdf, kTRUE);
00578 
00579 
00580   // link additonal parameters to the pdf:
00581   RooListProxy * proxyList =  new RooListProxy(TString(GetName()) + ".proxyList",
00582                                                TString(GetTitle()) + " proxyList",
00583                                                thePdf);
00584   proxyList->add(*_nBB);
00585   proxyList->add(*_absoluteEff);
00586   proxyList->add(*_brBtoDK);
00587   proxyList->add(*_brDtoK2pi);
00588   proxyList->add(*_brDto3piOverK2pi);
00589 
00590   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00591 }
00592

00595   _maxRange = maxRange;
00596 }

00602     return 0;
00603   }
00604 
00605   return _numEvt[index];
00606 }

00613     set.add(*_numEvt[i]);
00614 
00615   return set;
00616 }

00673 //------------------------------------------
00674 RooExtendPdf * BdkPdfOnRes::extPdfPos(int index) {
00675   getPdf(); // wake up
00676    if (index < 0 || index >= BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES) {

00693 //------------------------------------------
00694 RooDataSet * BdkPdfOnRes::generate(RooDataSet* protoDataSet) {
00695   return generate((int)totalNumEvts(), protoDataSet);
00696 }
00697 
00698 //------------------------------------------
00699 RooDataSet * BdkPdfOnRes::generate(Int_t nEvents, RooDataSet* protoDataSet) {
00700   return generate(nEvents,false);
00701 }
00702 
00703 //------------------------------------------
00704 RooDataSet * BdkPdfOnRes::generate(Int_t nEvents, Bool_t fluctuateNevt) {
00705   getPdf(); // make sure all are initialized
00706    RooDataSet * data = 0;
00707    RooDataSet * data1 = 0;
00708    Double_t SumPos = 0;
00709    Double_t SumNeg = 0;
00710 
00711    cout << GetName() << "::generate(): generating " << endl;
00712    for(Int_t i=0; i<BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; i++) {
00713      cout << "  " << _numEvtPos[i]->getVal() 
00714           << " positive and " << _numEvtNeg[i]->getVal() 
00715           << " negative " 
00716           << BdkEvtTypes::name(i) << " events." << endl;
00717 
00718      SumPos += _numEvtPos[i]->getVal();
00719      SumNeg += _numEvtNeg[i]->getVal();
00720    }
00721 
00722   Int_t nEvts1 = (Int_t) (nEvents*SumPos/(SumPos+SumNeg));
00723   Int_t nEvts2 = (Int_t) (nEvents*SumNeg/(SumPos+SumNeg));
00724 
00725   if (fluctuateNevt) {
00726     cout << GetName() <<".generate(): Requested number of events: B+ = "
00727          << nEvts1 << ", B- = " << nEvts2;
00728 
00729     nEvts1 = RooRandom::randomGenerator()->Poisson(nEvts1) ;
00730     nEvts2 = RooRandom::randomGenerator()->Poisson(nEvts2) ;
00731 
00732     cout << ". Generated: B+ = " << nEvts1 << ", B- = " << nEvts2 
00733          << ", asym = "<<(double)(nEvts2-nEvts1)/(nEvts1+nEvts2)      
00734          << endl;
00735   }
00736 
00737   RooArgSet deps = dependents(); 
00738 
00739   Bool_t genVerbose = kFALSE;
00740 
00741   _charge->setIndex(1);
00742   data = _addPdfPos->generate(deps, nEvts1, genVerbose);
00743   data->addColumn(*_charge);
00744   
00745   _charge->setIndex(-1); 
00746   data1 = _addPdfNeg->generate(deps, nEvts2, genVerbose);
00747   data1->addColumn(*_charge);
00748   data->append(*data1);
00749 
00750   delete data1;
00751   return data;
00752 }
00753 
00754 //------------------------------------------
00755 double BdkPdfOnRes::totalNumEvts() const {
00756   double result = 0;
00757    for(Int_t i=0; i<BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++i) {
00758      result += _numEvt[i]->getVal();
00759    }
00760    return result;
00761 }
00762 
00763 //---------------------------------------------------------
00764 void BdkPdfOnRes::useNnCont(Bool_t use) {
00765   for (int i = 0; i < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++i) {
00766     prodP(i)->includeNnCont(use);
00767     prodN(i)->includeNnCont(use);
00768   }
00769 }
00770 
00771 //---------------------------------------------------------
00772 void BdkPdfOnRes::useNnComb(Bool_t use) {
00773   for (int i = 0; i < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++i) {
00774     prodP(i)->includeNnComb(use);
00775     prodN(i)->includeNnComb(use);
00776   }
00777 }
00778 
00779 //---------------------------------------------------------
00780 void BdkPdfOnRes::useDE(Bool_t use) {
00781   for (int i = 0; i < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++i) {
00782     prodP(i)->includeDeltaE(use);
00783     prodN(i)->includeDeltaE(use);
00784   }
00785 }
00786 
00787 //---------------------------------------------------------
00788 void BdkPdfOnRes::useMd(Bool_t use) {
00789   for (int i = 0; i < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++i) {
00790     prodP(i)->includeMD(use);
00791     prodN(i)->includeMD(use);
00792   }
00793 }
00794 
00795 //---------------------------------------------------------
00796 void BdkPdfOnRes::useMes(Bool_t use) {
00797   for (int i = 0; i < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++i) {
00798     prodP(i)->includeMes(use);
00799     prodN(i)->includeMes(use);
00800   }
00801 }
00802 
00803 //---------------------------------------------------------
00804 void BdkPdfOnRes::useDalitz(Bool_t use) {
00805   for (int i = 0; i < BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES; ++i) {
00806     prodP(i)->includeDalitz(use);
00807     prodN(i)->includeDalitz(use);
00808   }
00809 }
00810 
00811 //---------------------------------------------------------
00812 void BdkPdfOnRes::useVar(BdkPdfProdAll::Var var, Bool_t use) {
00813   switch (var) {
00814   case BdkPdfProdAll::DELTAE: 
00815     useDE(use);
00816     break;
00817   case BdkPdfProdAll::MD:
00818     useMd(use);
00819     break;
00820   case BdkPdfProdAll::MES:
00821     useMes(use);
00822     break;
00823   case BdkPdfProdAll::DALITZ:
00824     useDalitz(use);
00825     break;
00826   case BdkPdfProdAll::NNCONT:
00827     useNnCont(use);
00828     break;
00829   case BdkPdfProdAll::NNCOMB:
00830     useNnComb(use);
00831     break;
00832   }
00833 }

00837 //---------------------------------------------------------
00838 void BdkPdfOnRes::printVariables() {
00839   // Print variables for arbitrary event type
00840   prodP(0)->printVariables();
00841 }

00843 
00844 //-----------------------------------------------
00845 void BdkPdfOnRes::asymLink(int typeIndex, int sourceIndex) {
00846 
00847   if (typeIndex<0 || typeIndex>=BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES ||
00848       sourceIndex<0 || sourceIndex>=BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES) {
00849     cerr << GetName()<< ".asymLink(): Index " << typeIndex << " or "<<sourceIndex 
00850          << " is out of allowed range(0-9). Not linking asymmetries."
00851          << endl;
00852   }
00853   else {
00854     setIsValid(kFALSE);  
00855     _typeAsym[typeIndex] = (RooRealVar *) typeAsym(sourceIndex);
00856   }
00857 }
00858 
00859 
00860 //------------------------------------------------
00861 BdkPdfProdAll * BdkPdfOnRes::prodP(int typeIndex) {
00862   switch(typeIndex) {
00863   case BdkEvtTypes::SIG_BAD_D   : return &sigBadD0P()   ; break;
00864   case BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D  : return &sigGoodD0P()  ; break;
00865   case BdkEvtTypes::DPi_BAD_D   : return &DpiBadD0P()   ; break;
00866   case BdkEvtTypes::DPi_GOOD_D  : return &DpiGoodD0P()  ; break;
00867   case BdkEvtTypes::DPiX        : return &DPiXP()       ; break;
00868   case BdkEvtTypes::DKX         : return &DKXP()  ; break;
00869   case BdkEvtTypes::BB_BAD_D    : return &BBBadD0P() ; break;
00870   case BdkEvtTypes::BB_GOOD_D   : return &BBGoodD0P(); break;
00871   case BdkEvtTypes::QQ_BAD_D    : return &qqBadD0P()  ; break;
00872   case BdkEvtTypes::QQ_GOOD_D   : return &qqGoodD0P() ; break;
00873 
00874   }
00875   if( typeIndex<0 || typeIndex>=BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES ) {
00876    cerr<< " Index " << typeIndex << " is out of allwoed range(0-9)."
00877        << " Unrecognized argument \"" << typeIndex << "\". Returning 0."
00878        << endl;
00879  
00880   }
00881 
00882   return 0;
00883 }
00884 
00885 //------------------------------------------------
00886 BdkPdfProdAll * BdkPdfOnRes::prodN(int typeIndex) {
00887   switch(typeIndex) {
00888   case BdkEvtTypes::SIG_BAD_D   : return &sigBadD0N()   ; break;
00889   case BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D  : return &sigGoodD0N()  ; break;
00890   case BdkEvtTypes::DPi_BAD_D   : return &DpiBadD0N()   ; break;
00891   case BdkEvtTypes::DPi_GOOD_D  : return &DpiGoodD0N()  ; break;
00892   case BdkEvtTypes::DPiX        : return &DPiXN()       ; break;
00893   case BdkEvtTypes::DKX         : return &DKXN()  ; break;
00894   case BdkEvtTypes::BB_BAD_D    : return &BBBadD0N() ; break;
00895   case BdkEvtTypes::BB_GOOD_D   : return &BBGoodD0N(); break;
00896   case BdkEvtTypes::QQ_BAD_D    : return &qqBadD0N()  ; break;
00897   case BdkEvtTypes::QQ_GOOD_D   : return &qqGoodD0N() ; break;
00898 
00899   }
00900   if( typeIndex<0 || typeIndex>=BdkEvtTypes::NTYPES ) {
00901    cerr<< " Index " << typeIndex << " is out of allwoed range(0-9)."
00902        << " Unrecognized argument \"" << typeIndex << "\". Returning 0."
00903        << endl;
00904  
00905   }
00906 
00907   return 0;
00908 }
00909 
00910 //------------------------------------------------
00911 // Set the values of the nsig and asym using the CP parameters:
00912 void BdkPdfOnRes::setNsigAsymFromXY(Bool_t recalcErrors) 
00913 {
00914   BdkOnResNLLYields yields(*this, 0);
00915   _sigGoodD0NumEvts->setVal(yields.expectedNsig());
00916   _typeAsym[BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D]->setVal(yields.expectedAsym());
00917 
00918   if (recalcErrors) {
00919     double nsig = _sigGoodD0NumEvts->getVal();
00920     double asym = _typeAsym[BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D]->getVal();
00921 
00922     double nsigErr = sqrt(nsig);
00923     double asymErr = sqrt(1. / nsig / (1 - asym * asym));
00924 
00925     _sigGoodD0NumEvts->setError(nsigErr);
00926     _typeAsym[BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D]->setError(asymErr);
00927   }    
00928 
00929   cout << GetName() << "::setNsigAsymFromXY(): set"
00930        << " nBB=" << _nBB->getVal()
00931        << ", nSig=" << _sigGoodD0NumEvts->getVal()
00932        << " +/- " << _sigGoodD0NumEvts->getError()
00933        << ", asym=" << _typeAsym[BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D]->getVal()
00934        << " +/- " << _typeAsym[BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D]->getError()
00935        << " from"<<endl;
00936   cpParams().Print("v");
00937 }
00938 
00939 
00940 //------------------------------------------------
00941 Bool_t BdkPdfOnRes::fit(RooAbsData& data, Bool_t usePenalty, Bool_t usePenaltyOnly)
00942 {
00943   // Do the yield fit
00944   // Use N2 but no Dalitz
00945   useDE();
00946   useNnCont();
00947   useNnComb();
00948   useDalitz(false);
00949 
00950   cout << "----------------------------------------------------------"<<endl;
00951   cout << GetName() << ".fit(): Doing yield fit:" << endl;
00952   printVariables();
00953   parametersFree().Print("v");
00954   
00955   _yieldFitResult = getPdf()->fitTo(data,Extended(true),Save(true),
00956                                     Minos(_useMinos),PrintLevel(_minuitPrintLevel));
00957     
00958   if (_yieldFitResult==0) {
00959     cout << GetName() <<".fit(): No fit result from first fit."<<endl;
00960     _xyFitResult = 0;
00961     return kFALSE;
00962   }
00963 
00964   // Do the x/y fit
00965   return fit(data, *_yieldFitResult, usePenalty, usePenaltyOnly);
00966 }
00967 
00968 
00969 //------------------------------------------------
00970 Bool_t BdkPdfOnRes::fit(RooAbsData& data, const RooFitResult& yieldFitResult,
00971                         Bool_t usePenalty, Bool_t usePenaltyOnly)
00972 {
00973   // Get correlation between signal yield and asymmetry
00974   Double_t corrNsigAsym = yieldFitResult.correlation(*sigGoodD0NumEvts(),
00975                                                      *typeAsym(BdkEvtTypes::SIG_GOOD_D));
00976 
00977   return fit(data, corrNsigAsym, usePenalty, usePenaltyOnly);
00978 }
00979 
00980 
00981 //------------------------------------------------
00982 Bool_t BdkPdfOnRes::fit(RooAbsData& data, Double_t corrNsigAsym,
00983                         Bool_t usePenalty, Bool_t usePenaltyOnly)
00984 {
00985   TString fitOption = "er";
00986   if (!_useMinos) fitOption += "m";
00987   
00988   // Use Dalitz but no N2
00989   useNnComb(false);
00990   useDalitz();
00991 
00992   // Fix everything except x and y
00993   RooArgSet paramsFree = parametersFree();  // save to restore later
00994   fixAll();
00995 
00996   // If x/y (rho/theta) was free before make it floating again  
00997   RooArgList cpList(cpParams());
00998 
00999   for (int i=0; i<cpList.getSize(); i++) {
01000     RooRealVar& r = (RooRealVar&)cpList[i];
01001     if (paramsFree.contains(r)) r.setConstant(kFALSE);
01002   }
01003 
01004   // RooMinuit.cc line 833 gives error status if the NLL returns 0. So
01005   // move out of the minimum a little:
01006   ((RooRealVar&)cpList[0]).setVal(((RooRealVar&)cpList[0]).getVal() + 0.0001);
01007 
01008   RooNLLVar* nllVar = new RooNLLVar("nll","-log(likelihood)",*getPdf(),data,
01009                                     RooArgSet(),true);
01010   
01011   
01012   RooAbsReal* finalNLL = nllVar;
01013   BdkOnResNLLYields* penalty = 0;
01014 
01015   cout << "----------------------------------------------------------"<<endl;
01016   cout << GetName() << ".fit(): Doing x/y fit:" << endl;
01017   printVariables();
01018   nBB()->Print();
01019   cout << "corrNsigAsym = " << corrNsigAsym << endl;
01020   parametersFree().Print("v");
01021 
01022 
01023   if (usePenalty) {
01024     
01025     // Create penalty term
01026     if (_nllYieldsSystBit<0) penalty = new BdkOnResNLLYields(*this, corrNsigAsym);
01027     else penalty = new BdkOnResNLLYields(*this, corrNsigAsym, _nllYieldsSystBit);
01028 
01029     if (penalty==0) {
01030       cout << GetName() << ".fit(): Cannot create penalty term."<<endl;
01031       _yieldFitResult = 0;
01032       _xyFitResult = 0;
01033       return kFALSE;
01034     }
01035 
01036     penalty->Print();
01037 
01038     if (usePenaltyOnly) {    
01039       finalNLL = penalty;
01040       cout << GetName() << ".fit(): Fitting with penalty only" << endl;
01041     }    
01042     else {         
01043       finalNLL = new RooFormulaVar("nll+penalty", "nll+penalty", "@0+@1",
01044                                    RooArgList(*nllVar, *penalty));      
01045       cout << GetName() <<".fit(): Fitting with penalty+nll" << endl;
01046     }
01047   }
01048   else cout << GetName() <<".fit(): Fitting without penalty" << endl;
01049     
01050   _minuit = new RooMinuit(*finalNLL);
01051   _minuit->optimizeConst(1);   // const optimizer
01052   _minuit->setPrintLevel(_minuitPrintLevel);
01053   _minuit->fit(fitOption) ;
01054   
01055   _xyFitResult = _minuit->save() ;
01056 
01057 
01058   // Restore floating parameters
01059   TIterator* iter = paramsFree.createIterator();
01060   while (RooRealVar* r = (RooRealVar*)iter->Next()) {
01061     r->setConstant(kFALSE);
01062   }
01063   delete iter;
01064   
01065   return kTRUE;
01066 }
01067 
01068 // Return final fit parameters from both fits (caller owns)
01069 RooArgSet* BdkPdfOnRes::fitResult()
01070 {
01071   if (_yieldFitResult==0 && _xyFitResult==0) return 0;
01072 
01073   RooArgSet* result = new RooArgSet("fitResult");
01074 
01075   if (_yieldFitResult) {
01076     result->addClone(_yieldFitResult->floatParsFinal());
01077     result->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("nllVar","nllVar",_yieldFitResult->minNll())));
01078   }
01079   if (_xyFitResult) {
01080     result->addClone(_xyFitResult->floatParsFinal());
01081     result->addOwned(*(new RooRealVar("xyNllVar","xyNllVar",_xyFitResult->minNll())));
01082   }
01083 
01084   return result;
01085 }  
01086

01090   BdkPdfDKDalitz* pdf = (BdkPdfDKDalitz*)sigGoodD0P().getDalitzPdf();
01091   if (pdf->coord()==BdkPdfDKDalitz::CART) return (RooRealVar*)pdf->x();
01092   else return 0;
01093 }

01147 
01148 //------------------------------------------------
01149 // Return the set of CP parameters
01150 RooArgSet BdkPdfOnRes::cpParams()
01151 {
01152   const BdkPdfDKDalitz& pdfN = *(BdkPdfDKDalitz*)sigGoodD0N().getDalitzPdf();
01153   const BdkPdfDKDalitz& pdfP = *(BdkPdfDKDalitz*)sigGoodD0P().getDalitzPdf();
01154   
01155   RooArgSet cpSet(GetName()+TString(".cpParams"));
01156 
01157   if (pdfN.coord()==BdkPdfDKDalitz::CART) {
01158     cpSet.add(*pdfN.x());
01159     cpSet.add(*pdfN.y());
01160   }
01161   else {
01162     cpSet.add(*pdfN.rho());
01163     cpSet.add(*pdfN.theta());
01164   }
01165 
01166   if (pdfP.coord()==BdkPdfDKDalitz::CART) {
01167     cpSet.add(*pdfP.x());
01168     cpSet.add(*pdfP.y());
01169   }
01170   else {
01171     cpSet.add(*pdfP.rho());
01172     cpSet.add(*pdfP.theta());
01173   }
01174 
01175   return cpSet;
01176 }
